title: Understanding Changes in the English Curriculum and Designing Competency-Based Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary English education basics and foundational curriculum development concepts
context.additional_context: Social studies curriculum-linked program for 20-something learners (students/job seekers), with project-based assessments in BYOD environments, focusing on transitioning from content-based to competency-based curricula

learning_goals: Learners can explain the historical changes in the secondary English curriculum and the characteristics of competency-based approaches.
Learners can compare and analyze content-based and competency-based teaching methods and apply them to actual lesson design.
Learners can propose project-based plans for textbook development and assessment tool design in response to curriculum changes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
